Articles.Content:
So I'm creating my first part with 3dsmax , using a bunch of differnet tutorials. when it comes to export the model, they all focus on having a scale factor 1.0. The thing is, no matter what I do, I do not have ANY number showing up. I just have a blank space where everybody has 1.0.

Anyone has the solution for this?

Thanks in advance!

What does your workflow look like? the current one should be:

* Save from Max as something friendly ( .max works fine )

* Open/drop into Unity

* When you click on the file in Unity you'll get a visible list of contents, and a bunch of import settings - that's where you set the scale factor. Mine default to 0.01 every single time...

* Drop your asset into a Unity scene, add a Parttools component, etc.

If that's what you're doing then it sounds like a Unity issue somewhere, you haven't got to anything KSP related yet.

hey thanks for the fast reply! I'll check now, see how it goes!

Anyway, thanks for the help!
If you export as an fbx with the 2013 plugin, works on any version of max and free, you get a conversion option. Here you can set the scale of the object to what ever. I leave mine at automatic.
